member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Specifies the subresources of a texture that are accessible from a depth-stencil view.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Format
member.summary: Resource data format (see ). See remarks for allowable formats.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.ViewDimension
member.summary: Type of resource (see ). Specifies how a depth-stencil resource will be accessed; the value is stored in the union in this structure.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A value that describes whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it is not read only; otherwise, pass one of the members of the enumerated type.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Texture1DArray
member.summary: Specifies an array of 1D texture subresources (see ).

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DArray
member.summary: Specifies an array of 2D texture subresources (see ).

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DMSArray
member.summary: Specifies an array of multisampled 2D textures (see ).
